title: CrackShot的问题
author: KarenX
txt_content:
怎么给CrackShot插件加新的枪？我加了之后就所有枪都消失了，我是用N+编辑的，
然后取消那些新加的枪后，就没事了。

replies.author: 上白丶慧泽音
replies.txt_content:
KarenX 发表于 2015-2-15 11:06
上图。
如用中文
请转码
要么格式不对
把新枪发下

replies.author: KarenX
replies.txt_content:
上白丶慧泽音 发表于 2015-2-15 11:14
如用中文
请转码
要么格式不对
M4A1:     Item_Information:         Item_Name: "&eM4A1"         Item_Type: 417         Item_Lore: "&eFully automatic with high power.|&eEffective at medium range.|&eControls are inverted."         Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0     Shooting:         Right_Click_To_Shoot: true         Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true         Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true         Delay_Between_Shots: 4         Recoil_Amount: 1         Projectile_Amount: 1         Projectile_Type: snowball         Projectile_Speed: 40         Projectile_Damage: 4         Bullet_Spread: 2         Sounds_Shoot: IRONGOLEM_HIT-1-2-0,SKELETON_HURT-1-2-0,ZOMBIE_WOOD-1-2-0     Sneak:         Enable: true         No_Recoil: true         Bullet_Spread: 1     Burstfire:         Enable: true         Shots_Per_Burst: 2         Delay_Between_Shots_In_Burst: 3     Reload:         Enable: true         Reload_Amount: 30         Reload_Duration: 40         Sounds_Out_Of_Ammo: ITEM_BREAK-1-1-0         Sounds_Reloading: FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-4,DOOR_OPEN-1-2-6,FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-36,HURT_FLESH-1-0-37,DOOR_CLOSE-1-2-38     Firearm_Action:         Type: slide         Close_Duration: 10         Close_Shoot_Delay: 12         Sound_Close: PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-0,PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-3     Scope:         Enable: true         Zoom_Amount: 5         Zoom_Bullet_Spread: 0         Sounds_Toggle_Zoom: ENDERDRAGON_WINGS-1-2-0     Abilities:         Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true     Hit_Events:         Enable: true         Sounds_Shooter: SHOOT_ARROW-1-2-0

replies.author: KarenX
replies.txt_content:
上白丶慧泽音 发表于 2015-2-15 11:14
如用中文
请转码
要么格式不对
M4A1:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&eM4A1"
        Item_Type: 417
        Item_Lore: "&eFully automatic with high power.|&eEffective at medium range.|&eControls are inverted."
        Sounds_Acquired: BAT_TAKEOFF-1-1-0
    Shooting:
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Delay_Between_Shots: 4
        Recoil_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Projectile_Type: snowball
        Projectile_Speed: 40
        Projectile_Damage: 4
        Bullet_Spread: 2
        Sounds_Shoot: IRONGOLEM_HIT-1-2-0,SKELETON_HURT-1-2-0,ZOMBIE_WOOD-1-2-0
    Sneak:
        Enable: true
        No_Recoil: true
        Bullet_Spread: 1
    Burstfire:
        Enable: true
        Shots_Per_Burst: 2
        Delay_Between_Shots_In_Burst: 3
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 30
        Reload_Duration: 40
        Sounds_Out_Of_Ammo: ITEM_BREAK-1-1-0
        Sounds_Reloading: FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-4,DOOR_OPEN-1-2-6,FIRE_IGNITE-1-1-36,HURT_FLESH-1-0-37,DOOR_CLOSE-1-2-38
    Firearm_Action:
        Type: slide
        Close_Duration: 10
        Close_Shoot_Delay: 12
        Sound_Close: PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-0,PISTON_RETRACT-1-2-3
    Scope:
        Enable: true
        Zoom_Amount: 5
        Zoom_Bullet_Spread: 0
        Sounds_Toggle_Zoom: ENDERDRAGON_WINGS-1-2-0
    Abilities:
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
    Hit_Events:
        Enable: true
        Sounds_Shooter: SHOOT_ARROW-1-2-0

shot list
